1345270.name: Road to Hollow Hills
1345270.description:
​

Road to Hollow Hills thrusts players into a world where the line between reality and nightmare blurs. Engage in combat, solve puzzles, and explore a desolate world to unravel the enigma of Hollow Hills.

Survival Horror: Navigate atmospheric environments filled with tension and dread.
Dynamic Exploration: Roam through diverse locations, from the desolate National Park to the mysterious Shadowed Grove, uncovering the interconnected stories that shape Hollow Hills.
Strategic Combat: Engage in visceral encounters with nightmarish creatures, utilizing a variety of weapons and tools. Manage stamina, choose your attacks wisely, and overcome relentless foes. Or try to avoid any combat!
Puzzles: Solve challenging puzzles scattered throughout the world, each unlocking new areas and revealing secrets.
Legacy System: Collect and utilize Legacy Tiers to enhance your attributes, uncover new abilities, and customize your character's strengths as you progress through the game.

Are you ready to face the nightmares that await on this haunting road?

Ride to survive, fight to win, Road... to Hollow Hills.
1345270.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
*具有完全音频支持的语言
